title: 关于ncp防作弊，如何关闭检测史莱姆块
author: zmdoyouknow
txt_content:
开启飞行检测玩家的史莱姆快无法弹起玩家
现在服务器只能暂时关闭生存飞行检测附赠ncp代码：已关闭状态
survivalfly:
      active: false
      extended:
        vertical-accounting: true
      stepheight: default
      setbackpolicy:
        falldamage: true
        voidtovoid: true
      actions: log:flyshort:3:10:f cancel vl>500 log:flyshort:0:10:if cancel vl>800 log:flylong:0:5:cif cancel vl>2500 log:flylong:0:5:cif cancel
      hover:
        active: true
        step: 10
        ticks: 85
        loginticks: 50
        falldamage: true
        sfviolation: 1000
    trace:
      size: 60
      mergedist: 0.9752
    vehicles:
      preventdestroyown: true
      enforcelocation: default
    velocity:
      activationcounter: 80
      activationticks: 140
      strictinvalidation: true
    ignorestance: default
    tempkickillegal: true
    loadchunks:
      join: true
    sprintinggrace: 2.0
    assumesprint: true
    speedgrace: 4.0
    enforcelocation: default复制代码
求个解决方案
